doc.field: E A f2653reute r f BC-macmillan-bloedel-to 03-20 0063
MACMILLAN BLOEDEL MMBLF> TO REDEEM DEBENTURES

MacMillan Bloedel Ltd said it will redeem all outstanding nine pct series J debentures on April 27, 1987 for 34.9 mln U.S. dlrs, plus a premium of one pct and accrued and unpaid interest. The series J debentures were issued in Europe in 1977 and were due February 1992, the company said. Reuter
